identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Medical precision meets Swiss typographic discipline.
Emotion First: Trust, Speed, and Alertness.
Content is King: Data clarity is the hero. No chart junk.
Zoom In: Focus on the 'Abnormal' values.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load in dense tables.
Contrast: Critical values must scream; normal values must whisper.
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal CTAs (Use Medical Blue or Alert Red)
Generic 'SaaS Blue' (Use a specific, deep 'Trust Blue')
Low contrast text (Medical data must be #000000 or #111827)

headings.purpose: Headings, KPIs, and Data Values (Numbers look great in Manrope)

rules: Table numbers must be tabular-nums to align vertically.
Labels must be uppercase, text-xs, font-semibold, tracking-wider, and text-muted-foreground.

primary.description: Deep Slate (almost black) for confident, professional actions.

brand.description: Sky Blue - used for 'Active' states, links, and non-critical highlights.

critical.description: NABL MANDATORY: High Values & Critical Alerts.

layout.grid_system: The Bento Grid - Mode B (High Density)

buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.destructive: bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-3 py-2

inputs.base: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-400 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

status_badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

accessibility.contrast: Strict adherence to APCA standards. Critical alerts must have 4.5:1 contrast.
accessibility.aria: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label. Status changes must use aria-live regions.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use stroke-width=1.5 for a refined, medical look.
assets.logo_placeholder: Use a text-based logo with 'Manrope' font: 'LIMS' + 'Pro' in bold.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME: Use the 'Clinical Precision' theme. Clean, white, slate, and specific semantic colors for values.
2. DASHBOARD: Use a Sidebar layout. The main content area should have a light grey background (#F1F5F9).
3. TABLES: This is a data-heavy app. Spend extra effort on Table components. Use fixed headers, sortable columns, and clear pagination.
4. CRITICALS: Implement the 'Flashing Red' requirement for critical values using Tailwind's `animate-pulse` class on the background or badge.
5. FORMS: Group form fields logically (e.g., 'Patient Details', 'Sample Info'). Use Cards to separate these sections.
6. NABL COMPLIANCE: Ensure every critical action (Result Entry, Verification) has a 'Save & Verify' workflow, not just 'Save'.
7. EXPORTS: All pages MUST rely on `export default function PageName` and named exports for components.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Do not center align the app container.
Never use 'System Fonts' if possible, load Manrope/Inter from Google Fonts.
Use 'Slate' (Cool Grey) instead of 'Gray' (Neutral) for a more modern, tech feel.
